info.name: DEPRECATED -  Yahoo Mail - WIDE BOX destinataires
info.description: DEPRECATED - Quand on rédige un mail, la box d'ajout d'un destinataire (contact) est trop petite : elle oblige à scroller. Ce script augmente simplement sa taille..... Was for the Yahoo Mail previous NEW layout , but not the last New YAhooo Mail Interface of Decembre 2012. NOW you can test/use : YAHOO NEW MAIL - DARK/GREY life V.2 .(BETA) and YAHOO NEW MAIL - DARK/GREY life (Adaptation for the New YAhooo Mail Interface of December 2012 )
info.additionalInfo: V.3 : Support for the NEW Yahoo Web Mail - BIG Contact PopUp Box - Contact Search Fixed in the Header Was for the Yahoo Mail previous NEW layout , but not the last New YAhooo Mail Interface of Decembre 2012. NOW you can test : YAHOO NEW MAIL - DARK/GREY life V.2 .(BETA) and YAHOO NEW MAIL - DARK/GREY life
